content: Investments Retirement Asked by AnonymousAsked on 18 Sep 2019Is investing in options the same as doing forex?I'm currently investing in ETFs through robo-advisors every month but am keen in finding out more on options to obtain higher returns and how it compares to trading forex or investing through ETFs in terms of track record and returns achieved.1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Gabriel Tham, Tag Team Member at Kenichi Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 18 Sep 2019Options are more complicated than forex. You can read more here :  https://www.investopedia.com/terms/o/option.asp
There are many many options strategies and terms and not just technical charts.0 comments1
